ExampleDefinition.Title: Multiple X-Axes
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates a line chart with four series and multiple top / bottom X-Axis and left / right Y-Axis. SciChart supports multiple top or bottom X-Axes and multiple left and right Y-Axes. This example shows in a simple way how to register a line series on each axis
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Multiple Top-Bottom X-Axes</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Demonstrates a line chart with four series and multiple top / bottom X-Axis and left / right Y-Axis. SciChart supports multiple top or bottom X-Axes and multiple left and right Y-Axes. This example shows in a simple way how to register a line series on each axis.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Interactivity Options</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Drag any axis to scale.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Drag the chart to zoom.</Run> <LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic"> - Double click to reset zoom.</Run>
